title: Living tomorrow. No. 108
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Hydroponic production of turf; a tooth transplant at Sunderland General Hospital; an amazing demonstration of the properties of Barrier Cream, involving an otherwise unprotected human hand immersed in hydrochloric acid; paints which change color and can be used as very accurate temperature gauges in engines.
